body.name: Softsoap Clean & Protect Antibacterial Liquid Hand Soap, Cool Splash Hand Soap, 11.25 Ounce, 6 Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 40 mins
features: 11.25 oz pump bottles of Softsoap Clean and Protect Liquid Antibacterial Hand Soap, Liquid Hand Pump Soap with Cool Splash Scent
Refreshing Cool Splash scent leaves your skin invigorated when using Softsoap Clean and Protect Antibacterial liquid hand soap
Eliminates 99.9% of bacteria that can potentially cause disease (in a handwashing test vs. the following common harmful bacteria: S. aureus & E. coli)
Softsoap antibacterial hand soap’s label is fun and joyful, you’ll want to show it off
Keep this refreshing liquid pump soap on the sink to uplift every small moment
body.description: From the #1 liquid hand soap brand†, Softsoap Clean and Protect Liquid Antibacterial Hand Soap eliminates 99.9% of bacteria that can potentially cause disease.* With a refreshing Cool Splash scent, this antibacterial soap effectively cleans hands while infusing small moments with joy. Softsoap Clean & Protect antibacterial liquid hand soap has a unique formula, is enriched with moisturizers and helps protect skin’s natural barrier by retaining skin’s natural moisture. Softsoap antibacterial hand soap liquid is paraben free, formulated without phthalates, and dermatologist tested. Feel the joy of clean with Softsoap hand soap! Use this hand wash soap in the bathroom or the kitchen to uplift every small moment while keeping your hands clean. This liquid hand soap washes away bacteria and is an effective way to keep hands clean. Plus, this liquid soap is dermatologist tested, paraben free and formulated without phthalates, and retains skin’s natural moisture, so you can feel good about washing your hands. Enjoy those small moments of joy and get brilliantly clean with Softsoap Clean and Protect Liquid Antibacterial Hand Soap. †Based in part on data reported by Nielsen through its Market Track Service for the Liquid Hand Soap Category for the 52 week period ending 1/1/22, for the All Outlet market. Copyright © 2022 Nielsen. *in a handwashing test vs. the following common harmful bacteria: S. aureus & E. coli.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Antibacterial Liquid Hand Soap Clean & Protect, Cool Splash Softsoap is trusted to clean your hands since 1975. Due to its unique formula, the liquid hand soap pump should only be refilled with Softsoap Antibacterial Liquid Hand Soap. Wash hands with soap and clean running water for 20 seconds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice scent soap - antibacterial- works great.If you have to use it a lot, and you are in a cold climate, it can be drying on the skin. But using hand cream after using the soap helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Antibacterial Soap With Moisturizers
reviews.reviewText: Have used Softsoap for years. Couldn't ask for a better product. Recently listened to a discussion about skin having both bacteria and fungi on it. Actually viruses are on it too. The discussion said antibacterial soap kills bacteria but not fungi. The remaining presence of fungi can promote eczema. So I decided to do a test and wash & bathe with another liquid soap brand that simply washes -- it does not kill bacteria. I ordered this product for the high quality pump bottles. They last a very long time without the pump breaking. I swapped the Softsoap into the other product's bottles and will use it once testing is done. I am a little bit skeptical of the claim killing bacteria but not fungi is such a significant contributor to eczema. Bacteria is in the air and as soon as we wash with a bacteria killing soap it begins to repopulate on our skin. Even the towel used to dry after washing likely has some bacteria even if only from exposure to air after washing. Certainly worthwhile to do the test, just not really expecting any dramatic change to eczema. Other reports have said killing bacteria tends to result in new strains forming and they suggest washing with a nonantibacterial soap. Even they don't explain the actual mechanism. Is it the small percentage of surviving bacteria that mutate to help build resistance to antibacterial soap? The subject very quickly becomes a biology geek pursuit to really understand it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delivered as promised.
reviews.reviewText: I use this product all the time and home delivery makes it perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient Bulk Order
reviews.reviewText: As of this writing, Amazon is charging for a 6-bottle box about the same price or cheaper than for a similar quantity of Softsoap you'd buy in a brick-and-mortar store. So you can't beat the convenience of having Amazon ship it right to you; and as for the quantity, hand soap is like toilet paper-- you can never have too much, since you're going to end up using it all eventually:)As for the scent, I purchased "Cool Splash", which has a pleasant, understated oceanic smell.And like most hand soaps, the manufacturer, Colgate-Palmolive, claims that their product is effective against "99.9%" of disease-causing bacteria.So, a good value for the money.
